Name: Scotch Bounty
Ingredients: 15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A medium-sweet Scotch whisky-laced combination of chocolate, coconut and orange. I revisited this cocktail in November 2022. The original recipe was 45ml (1½oz) Scotch whisky, 15ml (½oz) white cacao, 15ml (½oz) coconut rum, 45ml (1½oz) orange juice, 5ml (1 barspoon) grenadine syrup.
History: A cocktail from late-1990s London, named due to its base of Scotch whisky and flavour resembling that of coconut-filled Bounty chocolate bars. Mars launched Bounty Bars in the United Kingdom and Canada in 1951.
Nutrition: One serving of Scotch Bounty contains 170 calories
